Two scientists must save the planet when terrorists destroy a supercollider." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1283479/","name":"Annihilation Earth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTA4ODQ5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc5NTAzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two scientists must save the planet when terrorists destroy a supercollider.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1283479/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MartianOctocretr5"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"David, it's all your fault!","reviewBody":""Colliders" have gone berserk. They're some kind of mega-efficient energy providing devices (I guess), and now they're colliding with Mother Nature. I think. Things are blowing up.

One of the premier scientists in the world, who engineered this technology talks on his cell phone a lot. Usually to an almost unrecognizable Marina Sirtis (Star Trek, Next Gen). "David, this is all your fault. You better stop these disasters." She then hangs up, waits for another catastrophe to occur, then calls him: "David, you really need to stop these disasters. Now, David." It really started to sound like Hal 9000 after a while.

Anyway, what story there is, takes the normal course in a "world may end because of bad science" movie, with a very obvious but still nonsensical ending. As for Marina, she's probably still yelling at David.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":840,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.1},"genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-12-12","keywords":"no survivors,scientist,terrorist,extinction,end of the world","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331577/","name":"Luke Goss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000642/","name":"Marina Sirtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758760/","name":"Colin Salmon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0386431/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1878140/","name":"Rafael Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 6782276, Title: The Padre, --- Description: The Padre: Directed by Jonathan Sobol. With Tim Roth, Nick Nolte, Luis Guzmán, Juana Arboleda. Retired Judge Randall and his hired gun, Gaspar, track down a con man posing as a priest in a small Colombian town only to be thrown off-course by a scrappy 16-year-old girl intent on reuniting with her sister in the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6782276/","name":"The Padre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRiZTBmMGYtZjQwMy00NmJlLWE2ZDktZTA3MWU2MDcwMDViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MTUzMjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired Judge Randall and his hired gun, Gaspar, track down a con man posing as a priest in a small Colombian town only to be thrown off-course by a scrappy 16-year-old girl intent on reuniting with her sister in the United States.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6782276/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"larrys3","dateCreated":"2018-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lacks Dramatic Tension & Suspense","reviewBody":"Set in Colombia, Tim Roth portrays a pickpocket and conman disguised as a padre, as he tries to escape the pursuing ex-Marshal Nick Nolte, who believes Roth was responsible for the death of his pregnant daughter. Nolte has hired Luis Guzman, a local police officer, to help him in this pursuit and to smooth things over when Nolte disrespects the local populace or their customs. Finally, Valeria Henriquez is quite engaging as the young charmer Lena, who is desperate to join her sister in Minnesota (sold online to a family when they were both in a church orphanage) and will even team up with the "padre" to get there.\n\nWith this good cast and storyline I guess I expected more from this movie, but it lacked dramatic tension and suspense and came across as too flat-toned. Overall, it just never seemed to gel into anything substantial, as I see it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-28","keywords":"girl","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Padre","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi181189401","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NzM0OGEtY2ZhMi00MmY4LWExZGEtOWYzYWQ0MTYzZWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NzM0OGEtY2ZhMi00MmY4LWExZGEtOWYzYWQ0MTYzZWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1038286/","name":"Jonathan Sobol"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133523/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053578/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3127634/","name":"Stephen Kunc"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Deep Burial: Directed by Dagen Merrill. With Tom Sizemore, Sarah Habel, Dominic Monaghan, Phil Austin. In the near future, when communications go offline at a remote nuclear power plant isolated in the desert, a young safety inspector, Abby Dixon, is forced to fly out to bring them back online. Once inside the facility, mysterious clues and strange behaviors cause Abby to have doubts about the sanity, and perhaps identities, of the two employees onsite." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2449638/","name":"Deep Burial","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRmYWM1MDYtZjRkMC00ZWRkLTgzZWUtNjg5NDdhYTE3ZDgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the near future, when communications go offline at a remote nuclear power plant isolated in the desert, a young safety inspector, Abby Dixon, is forced to fly out to bring them back online. Paranormal Witness
programme.desc: Paranormal Witness: With Gillian English, Frances Townend, Daniel Cannis, Colin Murphy. A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1874066/","name":"Paranormal Witness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkZTQxZTEtN2VjYi00ZDg3LTlkZDAtMWIzMGNjODcwMzE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY0NzcxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1874066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dsaillant811"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrifying","reviewBody":"This is one of the freakiest shows on TV, but before watching it, you need to know what you're getting into. This show DOES NOT try to prove or disprove the paranormal. Nor are the stories even slightly realistic. When you realize that, you will appreciate the show much more. I really don't like the 2-story episodes of season 1. Season 2 is a lot better. Season 2 is all-around stronger, better, and scarier. There are plenty of jump scenes and loads of suspense. This is probably the best "Haunted Documentary" style show on TV. Some episodes are just pure junk, but the "Man in the Attic," "Capitol Theater Haunting," and "The Dybbuk Box" are by far the freakiest and most jumpy episodes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"genre":["Documentary","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-09-07","keywords":"haunting,poltergeist,two word title,eyewitness account,documentary series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7025791/","name":"Gillian English"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3266807/","name":"Frances Townend"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3141457/","name":"Daniel Cannis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178419/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paranormal Witness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3941252377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal Witness"}}</script><metacontent="

I really don't like the 2-story episodes of season 1. Season 2 is a lot better. Season 2 is all-around stronger, better, and scarier. There are plenty of jump scenes and loads of suspense. This is probably the best "Haunted Documentary" style show on TV. Some episodes are just pure junk, but the "Man in the Attic," "Capitol Theater Haunting," and "The Dybbuk Box" are by far the freakiest and most jumpy episodes.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"genre":["Documentary","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-09-07","keywords":"haunting,poltergeist,two word title,eyewitness account,documentary series","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7025791/","name":"Gillian English","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3266807/","name":"Frances Townend","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3141457/","name":"Daniel Cannis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178419/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paranormal Witness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3941252377","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal Witness"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Jurassic Park 3
programme.desc: Bok, ein Ferengi, will sich an Picard rächen, der in einem schon lange zurückliegenden Krieg Boks Sohn getötet hat. Nun droht er, im Gegenzug Picards Sohn zu ermorden. Der Captain ist zunächst völlig überrascht, doch dann findet er heraus, dass ihn eine kurze Affäre vor 24 Jahren tatsächlich zum Vater gemacht hat. Nur wenig später muss er bereits um das Leben seines Sohnes Jason fürchten, der von Bok verschleppt wurde.

programme.title: San Andreas Mega Quake
programme.desc: Jeanie Miller, Rodney McKays Schwester, wird aus ihrem Haus in Vancouver entführt. McKay, Sheppard and Ronon machen sich sofort auf den Weg zur Erde, um sie zu suchen. Dr. McKay stellt schnell fest, dass offenbar Jeanies Computer angezapft wurde, und verfolgt diese Spur bis zu einem Bürogebäude, ohne sich von Sheppard und Ronon absichern zu lassen. Prompt erweist sich die Spur als eine Falle: Der Industrielle Henry Wallace kidnappt McKay und will ihn zwingen, seine todkranke Tochter zu retten.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Picard erlebt noch immer wilde Zeitsprünge, die er nicht beeinflussen kann. Von Q erfährt er, dass die gesamte Menschheit gefährdet ist und unterzugehen droht. Um dies zu verhindern, muss Picard ein bestimmtes Ereignis in der Zukunft verhindern.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Picard erlebt noch immer wilde Zeitsprünge, die er nicht beeinflussen kann. Von Q erfährt er, dass die gesamte Menschheit gefährdet ist und unterzugehen droht. Um dies zu verhindern, muss Picard ein bestimmtes Ereignis in der Zukunft verhindern.
